トランスフォビア

songs.preamble:
Pumped up kicks is a hard song to like as a high-schooler. But it's a bop. It's got that whistled bit. The video has so many people vibing. The frisbee air-bounce. There's a meme comparing it to 夜に駆ける (yoru ni kakeru). However, that's not the Japanese song that pumped up kicks is like. Telecaster b-boy is that song.
I learned the song as a DDR map that has some fun twists and a quirky video. Then I started to listen to it casually. And I thought I knew what it meant: some sort of romance ending or something about some enigmatic television anchor or something.
After a quick google search, I realized that I was horrendously wrong. So horrendously wrong that I despaired for a day, convincing myself that my interpretation was one of many. But now I'm much more certain that I know what the song is about. But there's a lot of details that are... hard. And there are many versions of the song that you can find, each of which is fun to listen to and some are interesting interpretations of the original.

Tying on battered shoes.
The digital believer said a curse,
The boy became wind.

Swinging and swaying, Nirvana
Rest well inside hospice care.

name.english: Rock n' roll, the morning light falls on you
name.romaji: Korogaru iwa, kimi ni asa ga furu
name.japanese: 転がる岩、君に朝が降る

songs.preamble: The ending of Bocchi the rock hits hard. I mean, here's a spoiler-laced reaction video that resonates with me. But one thing that stuck with me is the song. After learning about the connection to Asian Kung-fu Generation, I became a fan -- the world world world album is great, 君の街まで slaps, and Re:re: has been stuck in my head since erased anyway.

japanese:
出来れば世界を僕は塗り変えたい
戦争をなくすような大逸れたことじゃない
だけどちょっと それもあるよな

俳優や映画スターには成れない
それどころか 君の前でさえも上手に笑えない
そんな僕に術はないよな

何を間違った それさえもわからないんだ
ローリング ローリング
初めから持ってないのに胸が痛んだ
僕らはきっとこの先も
心絡まって ローリング ローリング
凍てつく地面を転がるように走り出した

理由もないのに何だか悲しい
泣けやしないから 余計に救いがない
そんな夜を温めるように歌うんだ

岩は転がって 僕たちを何処かに連れて行くように ように
固い地面を分けて命が芽生えた
あの丘を越えたその先は
光輝いたように ように
君の孤独も全て暴き出す朝だ

赤い 赤い小さな車は君を乗せて
遠く向こうの角を曲がって
此処からは見えなくなった

何をなくした それさえもわからないんだ

僕らはきっとこの先も
心絡まって ローリング ローリング
凍てつく世界を転がるように走り出した

english:
If I could I'd repaint the world
Not something as big as world peace
But maybe there's a bit of that too

I can't be an actor or a movie star
Somebody like me? I can't smile properly in front of you
What can a guy like me do?

I don't even know the mistake that I made
rolling rolling
something I didn't have from the start still hurts my heart
surely from now on we'll still
be entangled rolling rolling
running like we're slipping on an icy floor

I don't have a reason, I'm just somewhat sad
I won't cry so I'm more helpless
I'm singing to warm up those nights.

The boulder rolls as if it's taking us some place some place
cutting the hard ground it sprouts life
crossing that hill and beyond that
in the light shining shining
the morning will expose your lonliness

A small small red car, with you in it
turns a distant corner
becomes invisible from here

I don't even know what I have lost
rolling rolling
something I didn't have from the start still hurts my heart
surely from now on we'll still
be entangled rolling rolling
running like we're slipping on an icy world
